posts.post_content:
Getting pretty darn close here to a set, just need the cards listed below! Help me out! 

Here's what I'm looking for: G-VG, raw (or I will crack), nice front, back type or even some back damage doesn't matter as much. I put them all in pages an album and like to look through the pages. 

One thing to note: I live in Canada, and I'm happy to pay extra SH, especially for bulk orders.

Thanks!

Seth

Emails are best:

sethgbernard (at) gmail.com
